37283.summary: Some customers in Dewdney and Durieu are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37283.title: May 12 – Mission (Dewdney and Durieu) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Work still continues in the area to get all services back online.  We thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 11:45 AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
37260.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37260.title: May 12 – Edmonton (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
